entry.title: A comparison between Radiance and other rendering engines
entry.summary: This posts compares Radiance with modern rendering engines, such as Renderman and Autodesk Insight. Radiance is seen as the gold standard for light simulation, but more modern engines are becoming more physically based and claim photorealistic results at a fraction of the time. Why should we use one over the other? - for the full content please visit the website.
